players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated Diana. Trust me."
Diana: "Bob, your story doesn't make sense. You investigated me but say Charlie is the mafia? I think you're lying and might be the real mafia."
You: "Bob, your claim doesn't add up. If you investigated Diana, what did you learn about her, not Charlie?"
Bob: "I investigated Diana and found evidence that she is the mafioso. I know my claim might seem suspicious, but I have solid proof."
You: "Bob, your claims flip-flop and don't add up. I think you're the mafia trying to confuse us."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
